/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApOngdRecvDeptLDao.selectApOngdRecvDeptL */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RECV_DEPT_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.APV_NO, T.RECV_DEPT_HST_NO, T.RECV_DEPT_SEQ, T.RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD, T.RECV_DEPT_ID, T.RECV_DEPT_NM, T.REF_DEPT_ID, T.REF_DEPT_NM, T.MODR_UID, TO_CHAR(T.MOD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MOD_DT, T.SEND_YN, T.ADD_SEND_YN,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.RECV_DEPT_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RECV_DEPT_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM AP_${storage}_RECV_DEPT_L T
AND T.APV_NO = #{apvNo, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND T.RECV_DEPT_HST_NO = #{recvDeptHstNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.RECV_DEPT_SEQ = #{recvDeptSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.SEND_YN = #{sendYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.APV_NO, T.RECV_DEPT_HST_NO, T.RECV_DEPT_SEQ
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
